NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
POKE: Use caution! There are patches of cacti buried under the sand here!
2 1
POKE: I hurried here as soon as sand began to recede from <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> to visit the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color> - but I did not account for the cacti in this dark cavern puncturing my suit!
3 2
POKE: Perhaps I should simply be patient.. It is terrifying, not knowing if there are cacti buried under the sand that may emerge at any time!
4 2
PYE: Oh, Poke.. If you should ever visit <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> again while the sand is receding, try exercising swiftness - the thick layer of sand should allow you to walk over the cacti!
5 4
POKE: My gratitude for your advice, Pye.. But may I suggest exercising practicality instead, and relocating these plants for the well-being of your visitors?
